Proof.description: Cryptographic proof that makes the subject verifiable.

verificationMethod.description: Reference to the key used to create the proof.

jws.description: The actual signature in JSON Web Signature format

challenge.description: Optional challenge to prevent replay attacks.

URI.description: An identifier in uri format for Verifiable Credentials

DID.description: DID string with the DID method `batterypass` followed by one of `eu, oem, cloud, bms, service` and then an identifier

256Hash.description: A SHA-256 or Keccak-256 hash of the complete VC in hexadecimal format.
